Description:
Pinnacle sub-penthouse living with three side-by-side car spaces!
Stand out from the crowd in more ways than one with this unique two-bedroom sub-penthouse that’s distinctly different from the rest inside the Doncaster Primary School and Doncaster Secondary College catchment area.
Presented as new and enjoying the prestige of a 9th floor position with a spectacular 180-degree panoramic view towards the Macedon Ranges, Melbourne airport, the CBD and Port Phillip Bay, it’s a view of perfection from this prized position on top of Doncaster Hill. And when you direct your attention inside this customised two-bedroom abode in the acclaimed Pinnacle apartment complex, you’ll quickly discover that the difference most certainly rests in the detail.
From extra lighting and power points to two-pack cabinets throughout and custom-made furnishings, careful consideration and impeccable attention to detail adorns every square of this upgraded residence. There’s also the generous offering of three basement car spaces, grouped together to offer a sizeable parking bay that’s envy of many!
Watch fireworks light up the night sky on New Year’s Eve from the spectacular entertaining terrace, which is fitted with louvres to offer protection against the elements. Those same views can also be savoured from the comfort of the radiant open-plan living and excellent master bedroom, designed with walk-through robes and ensuite.
Soft-closing drawers, Caesarstone benchtops, quality stainless steel appliances, feature lighting and a plumbed fridge space add style and functionality to the deluxe kitchen, while a private home office (with built-in shelving) at the front of the apartment is particularly beneficial for those running a business from home.
Abundant space and comfort defines the second bedroom that’s serviced by a central main bathroom (with Euro laundry), while video intercom, lift access, secure entry, electric blinds in the living area, an electric heating panel and split-system heating/cooling enhances the appeal of this feature-packed abode.
Add to the mix an unbeatable location where Westfield Shoppingtown and city-bound bus services are just across the road and the Eastern Freeway is around the corner and it’s easy to see why this is the pinnacle of lock-and-leave living in Manningham.
